subject: Olny this 5 days special price on pharma for you dear customer
body:
Hello there!!! 
Matchless proposal for you Dear Clients!!!
During these five days only for our byers unthinkable offer!!! 
On all medicinal remedies you want!!!  
Fill in your life with colours of joy!!! 
http://moonpitch.hk/
Sincerely Yours,
On-line association of pharmaceutists
